description: Application for non-material amendments to planning permission PA/20/00557; Dated 24/08/2022.Non Material Amendment(s) sought:Changes to size of western core.Changes to size and location of eastern core.Introduction of northern core.Changes to main entrance, double doors to commercial units changed to single doors and doors added to top-storey in south elevation.Glazing reduced in north elevation.Changes to side entrance, removal of 2 sets of double doors, inclusion of single door and reduction of glazing in  east elevation.Changes to doors, changes to parapet design and reduction in glazing in west elevation.Amendments to roof build up at 3rd floor level.Northern core lift overrun added at 5th  floor level.Internal layout alterations on all floors.Additional floorspace at roof level.Additional rooftop plant.
site_name: Land bounded by  2-10 Bethnal Green Road, 1-5 Chance Street  (Huntingdon Industrial Estate) and 30-32 Redchurch Street
